software-engineer-front-end.title: Software Engineer (Front-end)
software-engineer-front-end.excerpt: Your primary role as a Software Engineer (Front-end) would be to build, maintain, and/or provide support for our various front-end projects' UI/UX. You'll work with a diverse array of impactful, user-facing code including Drizzle, Ganache, our website and Truffle Boxes.
